content: We cut to The Old Monkey teaching a group about the tales of Sun Wukong, and he mentions the six relics where Wukong split himself. There is just one monkey who can venture through the lands to try and collect each of the Six Senses of the Great Sage, known as The Destined One.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Endings_Explained.md', within the main section titled 'Endings Explained', specifically from the subsection 'The Story So Far'.
The content is as follows:
We cut to The Old Monkey teaching a group about the tales of Sun Wukong, and he mentions the six relics where Wukong split himself. There is just one monkey who can venture through the lands to try and collect each of the Six Senses of the Great Sage, known as The Destined One.
